name: Dex:Become Famous
description:
You're life isn't going too hot right now, I get that, but it can get better, you can fix this.

Dex: Become Famous is a game unlike anything you've ever played. It's a combination of both an amazing story and an even better team of extremely talented people.  We spent a lot of time working on this and I failed a project to do it, so please play it.

Have Fun!!!
